# Ease of Breath (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 93

You grant the target the ability to survive in thin air, conferring a +20 inherent bonus on Fortitude saves to resist altitude sickness as well as saving throws to resist becoming [[Fatigued|fatigued]] due to altitude or thin air.
